post.author: 고상호
post.content:
I have a six-week contract for a JAVA Developer for someone experienced in Multi-tier development for a communications application. It is strictly coding based on UML diagrams and DB Schemas, with the focus being on the business and database.
You must have 3 + years experience with Java/J2EE Development, Struts, Servlets, Tomcat and mySQL. If you are a perfect match and meet all qualifications, please forward your up to date resume to this address.
Kathryn KathrynC@procom.ca Technical Recruiter
post.title: Java Developer...mySQL
